info.description:
3M Platform API - A comprehensive platform for user interactions, messaging, financial management, and profile management.

## Overview

This API provides a complete solution for the 3M Platform, featuring user authentication, profile management, real-time messaging, financial transactions, and support systems. All endpoints use Laravel Sanctum for authentication with Bearer tokens.

## Key Features

- **User Management**: Complete profile and financial profile management
- **Real-time Communication**: Chat system with AI moderation and file attachments
- **Financial Services**: Wallet management, transactions, and subscription plans
- **Social Features**: User interactions, blocking, and reporting systems
- **Support System**: Ticket management with file attachments and spam protection
- **Search & Discovery**: Advanced user search with filtering and pagination
- **Options API**: Static configuration options and predefined values for UI components

## Authentication

Most endpoints require Bearer token authentication:
```
Authorization: Bearer {your_token}
```

## Rate Limiting

- Chat: 60 requests/minute (30 for sending messages)
- Support: 10 requests/day per IP
- General: Varies by endpoint

For detailed information about specific API sections, please refer to the individual tag descriptions below.
info.title: 3M Api

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Endpoints related to user authentication, including login, logout, token management, and API key validation. These routes are used to verify user credentials, establish secure access to the API, and handle user session termination with optional OneSignal subscription cleanup.

tags.name: Profile
tags.description: Endpoints for viewing, updating, and managing the authenticated user's profile information, such as personal details, preferences, photos, and account settings. Includes comprehensive Profile Images and Albums API for organizing user photos into different categories like personal photos, places visited, interests, and fashion choices.

tags.name: Financial Profile
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user financial profile information including budget, capital level, income, milestone settings, and financial options. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

tags.name: Currencies
tags.description: Get all the available currencies data

tags.name: Chat
tags.description: The Chat API provides comprehensive messaging functionality for the platform, including direct messaging, message management, and chat room operations. All endpoints require authentication and integrate with RocketChat for real-time messaging. Features include AI-powered content moderation, file attachments, real-time events, and rate limiting.

tags.name: Reports & Interactions
tags.description: Endpoints for user interactions including profile management (archive, save, interest), user blocking, zoom call requests, and user reporting. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

tags.name: Contracts
tags.description: Endpoints for managing contracts between sponsors and seekers, including contract creation, approval, modification, and lifecycle management.

tags.name: People
tags.description: The People API provides endpoints for viewing public user profiles and their information. These endpoints allow authenticated users to view other users' profiles using their public username. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication and return comprehensive profile data including personal information, relationship preferences, financial details, living arrangements, and profile images. The API also includes a public endpoint for retrieving age ranges used in profile display and search functionality.

tags.name: Support Tickets
tags.description: Endpoints for managing support tickets, including creating, viewing, updating tickets, retrieving categories, statuses, and notification options, and managing ticket messages with file attachments. Supports both authenticated users and guest access with pagination. File attachments support PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG (max 15MB each). Rate limited: 10 requests per day per IP, 20 requests per day per IP network. All endpoints use optional authentication middleware, working with Bearer tokens or X-Guest-Email headers. Includes spam protection, file validation, and comprehensive ticket lifecycle management.

tags.name: Notifications
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user notifications, including listing, filtering, marking as read, updating importance, and managing user preferences. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

tags.name: Affiliate
tags.description: Endpoints for managing affiliate links, statistics, and earnings. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication using Laravel Sanctum.

tags.name: Wallet
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user wallet and balance information, including retrieving current balance, deposits, withdrawals, and purchase power. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Endpoints for searching user profiles with advanced filtering options including location, budget, languages, and custom parameters. Supports pagination, sorting, and role-based filtering. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

tags.name: Subscription
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user subscriptions, including viewing current subscription, available plans, submitting subscriptions, and managing budget upgrades. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication using Laravel Sanctum.

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user transactions, including viewing transaction history, details, status, and cancellation. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication using Laravel Sanctum. Supports filtering by status and type, with comprehensive transaction data including payments, subscription plans, and counterparty information. Features include status styling with CSS classes and color codes, pagination, and detailed transaction relationships.

tags.name: Options
tags.description: Endpoints for retrieving static configuration options and predefined values used throughout the 3M Matching Platform. These endpoints return static data that clients can use to populate dropdown menus, form fields, and other UI components. All options endpoints are public and do not require authentication.

tags.name: Account Management
tags.description: Endpoints for managing user account settings including username, password, and email updates. All endpoints require authentication using Laravel Sanctum Bearer tokens. Features include validation, activity logging, and security measures for account modifications.

tags.name: OneSignal
tags.description: Endpoints for managing OneSignal push notification subscriptions and player IDs. Handles device registration, subscription management, and logout cleanup for push notifications. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication using Laravel Sanctum.

custom_parameters.description: Array of custom parameter objects for advanced filtering

post.description:
Creates a new withdrawal transaction for the authenticated user. The system validates the user's available balance and processes the withdrawal request using the specified payment method and banking details.

## Authentication
- Requires authentication token in the request header
- Token must be obtained through login

## Withdrawal Methods

| Method | Type | Description | Required Fields |
|--------|------|-------------|-----------------|
| `SWIFT` | Bank Transfer | International bank transfer via SWIFT | bank_name, bank_swift_code, bank_account_number, bank_receiver_name |
| `SEPA` | Bank Transfer | European bank transfer via SEPA | bank_name, bank_swift_code, bank_account_number, bank_receiver_name |
| `USDT` | Cryptocurrency | USDT withdrawal to wallet | wallet_address |
| `BTC` | Cryptocurrency | Bitcoin withdrawal to wallet | wallet_address |

## Validation Rules
- **Amount**: Must be numeric and greater than or equal to 0
- **Method**: Must be one of the valid withdrawal methods
- **Currency**: Required field
- **Bank Details**: Required only for SWIFT and SEPA methods
- **Wallet Address**: Required only for USDT and BTC methods

## Balance Requirements
- Withdrawals can only use **available balance** (active_balance + affiliate_earning_balance)
- The system checks available balance before processing the withdrawal
- Pending or locked balances cannot be withdrawn

## Transaction Processing
1. **Validation**: All required fields are validated based on the selected method
2. **Balance Check**: System verifies sufficient available balance
3. **Transaction Creation**: A new withdrawal transaction is created with status 'pending'
4. **Banking Details**: Withdrawal-specific banking information is stored
5. **Response**: Transaction details are returned for tracking

error.description: Indicates if the request was successful
Indicates if the request was successful

errors.description: Validation errors (only present on validation failure)

Validation Errors.summary: Validation errors for missing or invalid fields

value.message: Please fill in all the fields correctly

method: The method must be a valid method.
bank_name: The bank name field is required.

get.description: Checks if the authenticated user has any active contracts.
Retrieves all contracts for the authenticated user (both as sponsor and seeker). Supports pagination and search functionality.

post.description: Creates a new contract offer to a partner. The user cannot offer contract to themselves, cannot have active contracts while offering new ones, and the partner cannot have active contracts. Cannot have pending contracts with the same partner. Partner must exist and have the opposite role (sponsor/seeker).

value.message: You cannot offer a contract to yourself
Please stop the latest contract before you can make new offers
A contract with this partner is already pending. Please approve or wait for it to be resolved before creating a new offer.
Partner already has an active contract

partner_username: The selected partner username is invalid.
duration_days: The duration days must be at least 30.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific contract.
Retrieves available contract templates for the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new contract template. Templates can be public or private and include default financial settings and duration.
Approves a pending contract. Can optionally override the contract duration in days (30-365).

duration_days.description: Override the contract duration in days

value.sub_messages: You've accepted the relationship contract. You're now officially connected ‚Äî let the journey begin

value.message: The total contract duration cannot exceed 365 days. Please reduce the number of extension days.

post.description: Rejects a pending contract.
Requests to extend an active contract.

value.message: The extension request has been sent to the partner for approval. You will be notified of the result.

action.description: Request to extend contract by 30 days

post.description: Requests to upgrade contract to the next stage (test_moon ‚Üí preliminary ‚Üí main). Contract type progression rules: test_moon can upgrade to preliminary or main, preliminary can upgrade to main, main cannot be upgraded further.

value.message: Well done! Now let's wait for the partner's response.

action.description: Request to upgrade contract to preliminary

value.message: You can only upgrade from 'Test Moon' to: Preliminary or Main
You have pending contract actions that need to be resolved first: Extension, Next Stage

post.description: Requests to change contract terms.

value.message: All done! Let's wait for your partner's approval of the changes.
Please make sure there are changes in the contract terms
You have a pending change request that conflicts with the current request. Please wait for approval of the pending changes for: Monthly Budget, Duration (Days)

post.description: Stops an active contract and starts a 72-hour cool-off period.

value.message: The cool off period has been started.
value.sub_messages: It will end by 10:00 am of 18 Jan 2024. If restarted, the skipped time will be added to the billing. If not, you will receive the last transfer until the current moment at the next billing date following the 3-day cool-off period.

post.description: Restarts a stopped contract.

value.message: Congratulations! Contract ABC12345 is now active again!
You cannot restart this contract. Please contact your partner to restart the contract.

post.description: Approves a pending contract action (extension, upgrade, or change request).

Example 1.summary: Action not found or not pending

value.message: Action not found or not pending
You cannot approve your own action

post.description: Confirms or rejects specific changes in a contract change request.

changes.description: Object containing field names as keys

post.description: Rejects a pending contract action.

Example 1.summary: Action not found or not pending

value.message: Action not found or not pending
You cannot reject your own action

get.description: Retrieve a user's basic profile information including personal details, relationship preferences, financial information, living arrangements, and profile images. This endpoint returns comprehensive profile data that allows authenticated users to view other users' profiles using their public username. The response includes age display preferences - when a user has set their age display to 'Show Age Range', the exact birth date is hidden and an age range is shown instead.

parameters.name: public_username
parameters.description: The public username of the user

extended_descriptions.description: I love traveling and exploring new cultures
I love traveling and exploring new cultures

get.description: Retrieve a user's relationship preferences and goals including relationship goals, partner preferences, duration preferences, and availability times. This endpoint provides detailed information about what the user is looking for in a relationship and their availability for different types of interactions.

parameters.name: public_username
parameters.description: The public username of the user

get.description: Returns all options related to the 'About Me' section of user profiles including education levels, professions, religions, age displays, ethnicities, orientations, personality types, languages, hobbies, and relocation readiness.
Returns options for relationship preferences and availability settings including relationship goals, partner preferences, duration preferences, and available time slots.

Returns financial profile options including capital levels and relationship milestone durations. Supports currency conversion via query parameter. When a currency parameter is provided, the capital_level labels will be converted to the specified currency using current exchange rates.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency code for amount conversion (defaults to USD)

get.description: Returns options for living arrangement preferences and availability settings including driving license, car availability, driver availability, and living format preferences.
Returns available sexual orientation options for user profiles.
Returns available religion options for user profiles.
Returns available ethnicity options for user profiles.
Returns available personality type options for user profiles.
Returns available relocation readiness options for user profiles.
Returns available education level options for user profiles.
Returns available hobby options for user profiles.
Returns available language options for user profiles.

Retrieve a user's financial profile information including budget, capital level, income, milestone gifts, and financial preferences. This endpoint provides comprehensive financial data that helps users understand each other's financial capabilities and expectations in relationships.

parameters.name: public_username
parameters.description: The public username of the user

get.description: Retrieve a user's living preferences and arrangements including transportation availability, living format preferences, and housing information. This endpoint provides details about the user's current living situation and preferences for different stages of relationships.

parameters.name: public_username
parameters.description: The public username of the user

get.description: Retrieve a user's profile images and album photos. This endpoint respects the user's privacy settings - if a user has hidden their images, only the profile picture will be returned. For managing your own profile images and albums, use the Profile Images and Albums API endpoints.

parameters.name: public_username
parameters.description: The public username of the user

get.description: Retrieve all available age ranges that can be used for profile age display and search criteria. These ranges are used when users choose to display their age as a range instead of exact age. This is a public endpoint that does not require authentication.

label.description: Display label for the age range (e.g., '21-25')

value.message: Sorry, Something went wrong. Please try again later.

post.description: Generates an AI-powered response to user questions using OpenAI's GPT model.

question.example: How do I reset my password?

response.description: AI-generated response in HTML format with Tailwind CSS classes
response.example:
To reset your password, follow these steps:

1. Go to the login page

2. Click on "Forgot Password"

3. Enter your email address

500.description: Internal Server Error - AI service unavailable

message.example: Unable to generate response at this time. Please try again later.
